plan.title: Update Plan
plan.desc: The following lists some future update plans. Everyone is welcome to contribute or help implement them. Currently, I am the only author, so the update speed may not be very fast. Thank you for your understanding!
plan.author: Author's Email: anqi4051{'@'}gmail.com

planList.content: More theme colors (very simple, hoping developers who are willing to help will create theme colors) and dedicated management popups, supporting translucent themes and custom themes (storing theme color configuration json through repository js form and obtaining, local cache storing current usage), supporting custom background images under translucent mode.
Find scripts you have already subscribed to among the updated scripts to filter those that can be updated with one click. Of course, blindly updating all of them isn't very slow right now anyway.

planList.desc: Add Internal Tutorial Documentation (Resolved, can be viewed in official documentation)
planList.content: Add repository usage tutorial on the toolbar for computer novices.

The current sorting and filtering use the dropdown menu provided by antd, but many problems have been found in actual use. To improve sorting and filtering, the first step is to refactor the dropdown menu, using other components or implementing it yourself. Currently, a-popover is considered to replace it. Secondly, the filtering function needs to provide author filtering support, and role filtering also needs to add exclusion methods. For intuitiveness, role filtering needs to consider adding character avatars.
Enhance the search function. The current search is only keyword detection; fuzzy matching needs to be considered (this item has low priority, as it's a lot of effort for little reward).
Provide more animation effects for UI interactions.
Add a route-like mechanism (but not actual routing) to the page, allowing click-to-navigate within the update view.

I won't write the whisper in the title, ehe! Currently, the author is quite busy juggling personal projects, studies, and work. Please don't blame me for the slow updates, wuwuwu. The best way to urge me to update is to sponsor the author or give this humble author a star (if you don't know what a star is, just forget it).

help.title: FAQ Q&A
help.modalTitle: Note: Any questions should be thought through or documented before asking
help.author: Author email: anqi4051{'@'}gmail.com

qa.q: Why does the repository keep failing to load? (Only for online repository)
qa.a: The repository uses GitHub addresses, and direct connections from China may be intermittent, which is normal. If it doesn't open, try a few more times or come back in a few minutes. You can also use BGI's local repository page. (If you're a wizard, you know what to do)
See BGI official website: User Manual - Script Repository.

No. The process of subscribing to a script is essentially just copying a file or folder to another folder. After each repository update, what gets updated is the central repository that stores all repository files locally. You need to manually subscribe again to the scripts that have updates to achieve the update (for details, see BGI official website: User Manual - Local Files).

qa.q: Why does the recent update disappear next time I open it?
qa.a: Limited by the current data acquisition method, after you click on a script with an update notification or clear the red dot, it will be marked as not updated. This may be resolved in the future.

qa.q: Can one-click update only update those with updates or let me choose?
qa.a: There are two reasons: 1 is the same as the previous question about recent updates, 2 is that the author (me) hasn't had time to implement it recently.

qa.q: Why is the comment function unavailable?
qa.a: Comments are not supported in local mode. Please visit the online repository and log in to your GitHub account to comment. How to use GitHub needs to be resolved by yourself.

qa.q: Why is there no XX script?
qa.a: Make good use of search. When searching, try to ensure keywords are accurate, such as "Sweet Flower", or if you can't find "logging" try searching "tree cutting". If you still can't find it after searching for each one, then no author has written it. You can try writing one yourself.

qa.q: What is README, why did it fail to load? Why is it not displayed?
qa.a: Read the README yourself first, do you understand it? Loading failure is the same as the first question. It's not displayed because there's no README.md file in that directory.

qa.q: Why can't some links be clicked? Why does it load for a long time without loading?
Why is there no response after clicking subscribe?
qa.a: Please open BGI, an import window will pop up, select import. If you're using the online repository and the script you subscribed to doesn't appear after refreshing the BGI page, please update the local repository and try again. If there are still issues, please ask in the relevant group.

qa.q: What should I do if this script doesn't work?
qa.a: Please ask in the relevant group, specific problems require specific analysis. When asking, make sure your screenshots and descriptions are sufficient.

qa.q: Why are my previous comments gone?
qa.a: Comments are generally not deleted. If comments disappear, it's likely because the node path you commented on has changed. For example, if the Crystal Ore directory was renamed to Crystal Water Ore, you'll see a new comment section.

qa.q: Why doesn't this script use Nahida?
qa.a: Authors need to consider whether everyone has her. If needed, try making one yourself.

qa.q: What should I do if I want XX function?
qa.a: If no author has written it, write one yourself!
If you still have questions, please search the official website first. If you can't find it on both the official website and here, please contact me.
